errors.error_description: The instructions state to run tests before setting the required `RUCAPTCHA_KEY` environment variable, which will cause the tests to fail due to a missing API key.
correction_candidates: Combine the steps into one command: `RUCAPTCHA_KEY=YOUR_KEY make tests`.
The tests can be run without an API key by using a specific flag: `make tests --no-api-key`.
The environment variable should be set in a `.env` file, not manually.
Reverse the order of the steps: first set the environment variable, then run `make tests`.
errors.golden_answer: Reverse the order of the steps: first set the environment variable, then run `make tests`.
